short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check when your favorite streamers are live.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension designed to help you stay up-to-date with your favorite Twitch streamers. This extension opens as a side panel in your browser, showing a list of the streamers you follow. You can see who is online without having to visit the Twitch website, making it easy to jump straight into the streamer page.
